actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To require the United States Postal Service to take measures to eliminate unnecessary delays in the processing and delivery of mail within certain areas of Riverside County, California.

summary.text: Directs the U.S. Postal Service to ensure that all areas within Riverside County, California, which have a 91752 or 92509 ZIP code are served by the San Bernardino Management Sectional Center.

titles.title: To require the United States Postal Service to take measures to eliminate unnecessary delays in the processing and delivery of mail within certain areas of Riverside County, California.
